overview:
Vitality addresses the billion-dollar medication adherence problem for pharmaceutical brands, retail pharmacies, and healthcare providers with a simple device â€” an Internet-connected pill cap. Vitalityâ€™s award-winning GlowCaps illuminate, play a melody, and even ring a home phone so patients don’t forget. GlowCaps send weekly emails to remote caregivers, send data to doctors through Google Health and Microsoft HealthVault, and automatically refill prescriptions. Vitality improves medication adherence, health, and peace of mind.

Vitality is the only company with a product designed to tackle the combination of factors that cause patient non-adherence. Leveraging deep expertise in customer research, wireless consumer electronics, web services, and behavioral psychology, Vitality’s patent pending solutions offer each patient the optimal mix of intervention, feedback, reminders, accountability, education, and incentives to improve their ongoing medication compliance.
